page.title: 11Popular Games
page.content: A popular game in the playground is "flicki, one ,two,three". It is like "hide and seek" except when you reach "den" you must shout "flicki one, two, three, or the person who is on can tick you. In summer a good game is where there are two sides. They all have bottles of water and they squirt each other. Indoors many people play games on their computers, such as "Chuckie Egg","Space invaders","Jet set Willie" etc which require skill to play. People also play board games such as "snakes & ladders","Cluedo" & "Monopoly".These are games which require dice."Cluedo" is a detective game, whilst in "Monopoly" you buy and sell buildings and streets.
